scripts.build: bun run lint && bunx tsup --config tsup.config.ts && shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r public/* dist/
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development bunx tsup --config tsup.config.ts --watch & shx cp -r public/* dist/
scripts.package:chrome: bun run build && cd dist && ../../../node_modules/.bin/bestzip ../RetractCheck-chrome.zip . && cd -
scripts.package:firefox: bun run build && shx cp public/manifest.firefox.json dist/manifest.json && cd dist && ../../../node_modules/.bin/bestzip ../RetractCheck-firefox.xpi . && cd - && shx cp public/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.package: bun run package:chrome && bun run package:firefox
